import React from 'react' import hottest from './hottestApi' function Hottest() { /* let keys = Object.values(hottest) let ranProducts = keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)] console.log(ranProducts) console.log(keys.length) */ return (

HOTTEST DEALS OF THE DAY

{hottest.slice(0,3).map(({ id, title, image, pricing, alt, }) => ( < div className=" w-[300px] hot" key={id} >

{title}

$ {pricing}

)) }
) } export default Hottest
